trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality of a scroll bar control.
trans-unit.target: 实现滚动条控件的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not inherit directly from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> class.
trans-unit.target: 你通常不会继承直接从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>类。

trans-unit.source: To create your own scroll bar class, inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建你自己的滚动条类，从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar>类。

trans-unit.source: The scroll box is sometimes referred to as the scroll thumb.
trans-unit.target: 滚动框有时称为滚动块。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the value range of the scroll bar control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整滚动条控件的值范围，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the distance the scroll box moves, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整滚动框移动的距离，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the starting point of the scroll box, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> property when the control is initially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整滚动框的起始点，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>属性最初显示控件时。

trans-unit.source: User interface guidelines suggest that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part.
trans-unit.target: 用户界面指南建议<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性设置相对于该用户将看到，不适用于包括不可见的部分的总大小的视图大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有一个图片框带滚动条显示大图像，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性应设置相对图片框的大小，而不图像的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates and initializes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> and adds it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建并初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>和将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property is set to `false` when a new instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> is created.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>属性设置为`false`时的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>创建。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> is automatically resized to fit its contents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动调整 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 的大小以完整显示其内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> should be automatically resized to fit its contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 应自动调整大小以适应其内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.AutoSize%2A> property has no effect on the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.AutoSize%2A>属性具有对该控件的外观没有影响。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.AutoSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.AutoSize" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件背景色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.BackColor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.BackColor" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在控件中显示的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />，表示在控件背景中显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.BackgroundImage" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 枚举中定义的背景图像布局。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> (Center , None, Stretch, Tile, or Zoom).
trans-unit.target: 值之一<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" />（Center、 None、 Stretch、 磁贴或缩放）。

trans-unit.source: Tile is the default value.
trans-unit.target: Tile 是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked if the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick" /> bit flag is set to <see langword="true" /> in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生类中的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick" /> 位标志设置为 <see langword="true" />，则在单击该控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> control sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick> bit flag to `false`, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> will not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>控件将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick>位标志设为`false`，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 获取创建控件句柄时所需要的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含创建控件的句柄时所需的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取此控件支持的默认输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> class, this property always returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode.Disable?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 在中实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>类，此属性始终返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode.Disable?displayProperty=nameWithType>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default distance between the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> control edges and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 控件边缘及其内容之间的默认距离。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在双击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> control sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick> bit flag to false, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> will not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>控件将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.StandardClick>位标志设为 false，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件显示的文字的字体。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于由控件显示的文本的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Font" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Font" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the scroll bar control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置滚动条控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the foreground color for this scroll bar control.
trans-unit.target: 表示此滚动条控件的前景色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the foreground color of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 默认为父控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be changed programmatically; it is not visible in the Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 仅可以以编程方式; 更改此属性它将不可见属性窗口中。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ForeColor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ForeColor" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the initial bounds.
trans-unit.target: 指定初始边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> that indicates the amount the current bounds should be increased by.
trans-unit.target: 指示当前边界应增加的量的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> values that indicate the how to define the control's size and position returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.GetScaledBounds(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.SizeF,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值的按位组合，指示如何定义由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.GetScaledBounds(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.SizeF,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" /> 返回的控件大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds to use when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> is scaled by a specified amount.
trans-unit.target: 返回以将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 缩放指定的量时要使用的边界。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> specifying the scaled bounds.
trans-unit.target: 指定缩放边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper method that used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> method to return the bounds that the control should be scaled by.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个帮助器方法使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>方法以返回应通过缩放控件的边界。

trans-unit.source: You may override this method if you wish to reuse <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> scaling logic, but you need to supply your own bounds.
trans-unit.target: 如果你希望重复使用，你可以重写此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>缩放逻辑，但你需要提供您自己的边界。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此控件所支持的输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ImeMode" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ImeMode" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value" /> property when the scroll box is moved a large distance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，当滚动框长距离移动时向 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value" /> 属性加上该值或从中减去该值。

trans-unit.source: A numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 一个数值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 10。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks in the scroll bar track on either side of the scroll box, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> property changes according to the value set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击中的滚动框中，任何一侧的滚动条轨道<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>根据中设置的值的属性更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can handle key press events so that when the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN key the scroll box moves.
trans-unit.target: 可以处理按键事件，以便当用户按 PAGE UP 或 PAGE DOWN 键滚动框移动。

trans-unit.source: User interface guidelines suggest that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part.
trans-unit.target: 用户界面指南建议<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性设置相对于该用户将看到，不适用于包括不可见的部分的总大小的视图大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有一个图片框带滚动条显示大图像，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性应设置相对图片框的大小，而不图像的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, added a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, and added a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> and a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>、 添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，并添加了一个水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar>和垂直<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>类概述。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> property is set relative to the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性设置相对于的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>。

trans-unit.source: You must add references to the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespaces to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 你必须添加对引用<xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType>要运行此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 所分配的值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the upper limit of values of the scrollable range.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可滚动范围的上限值。

trans-unit.source: A numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 一个数值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 100.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 100。

trans-unit.source: You might consider adjusting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A> property dynamically to match the size of the scroll bar's parent in proportion to pixel size or to the number of rows or lines displayed.
trans-unit.target: 你可能考虑调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A>属性动态以匹配的滚动条的父与成比例像素大小或数量的行或显示的行的大小。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value can only be reached programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 仅可以以编程方式达到最大值。

trans-unit.source: The value of a scroll bar cannot reach its maximum value through user interaction at run time.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条的值无法访问通过在运行时的用户交互其最大值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value that can be reached through user interaction is equal to 1 plus the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A> property value minus the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过用户交互达到的最大值等于 1 加上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A>属性值减去<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: If necessary, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A> property to the size of the object -1 to account for the term of 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要，你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A>属性的对象为-1 到帐户 1 的术语的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, added a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, and added a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> and a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>、 添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，并添加了一个水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar>和垂直<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>类概述。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A> property is set to the size of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> plus the size of the scrollbar if it is visible plus an adjustment factor of the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A>属性设置为的大小<xref:System.Drawing.Image>plus 滚动条是否可见的大小调整因子大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You must add references to the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespaces to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 你必须添加对引用<xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType>要运行此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lower limit of values of the scrollable range.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可滚动范围的值的下限。

trans-unit.source: A numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 一个数值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, added a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, and added a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> and a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>、 添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，并添加了一个水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar>和垂直<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>类概述。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A> property is set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A>属性设置为 0。

trans-unit.source: You must add references to the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespaces to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 你必须添加对引用<xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType>要运行此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用鼠标单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> control does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>控件不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.MouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用鼠标双击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> control does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.MouseDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>控件不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.MouseDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and the user presses a mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针位于控件上方并且用户按下鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> control does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>控件不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.MouseDown>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over the control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将鼠标指针移至控件上方时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over the control and releases a mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将鼠标指针移至控件上方并释放鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> control does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.MouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>控件不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.MouseUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" />
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" />

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" /> event
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" /> 事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> control will convert mouse wheel movements to scrolling when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> is in focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>控件将转换鼠标滚轮移动滚动时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnMouseWheel%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnMouseWheel%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnMouseWheel(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnMouseWheel(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnMouseWheel(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnMouseWheel(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnScroll%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnScroll%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用派生的类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> events are created.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>创建事件。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 此代码假定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>已在窗体上创建和按钮有一个事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code.
trans-unit.target: 单击该按钮，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>在代码中调整的滚动条的属性。

trans-unit.source: The label will display the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> property and the event that changed it.
trans-unit.target: 该标签将显示的当前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>属性并更改它的事件。

trans-unit.source: You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event, only the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 您将注意到，当滚动值更改按钮的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>仅事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll> event is raised immediately after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，滚动条滚动时手动<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll>后立即引发事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnScroll(System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnScroll(System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnScroll(System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnScroll(System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnValueChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnValueChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用派生的类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> events are created.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>创建事件。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 此代码假定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>已在窗体上创建和按钮有一个事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code.
trans-unit.target: 单击该按钮，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>在代码中调整的滚动条的属性。

trans-unit.source: The label will display the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> property and the event that changed it.
trans-unit.target: 该标签将显示的当前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>属性并更改它的事件。

trans-unit.source: You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event, only the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 您将注意到，当滚动值更改按钮的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>仅事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll> event is raised immediately after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，滚动条滚动时手动<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll>后立即引发事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnValueChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnValueChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnValueChanged(System.EventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.OnValueChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 在重绘控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the scroll box has been moved by either a mouse or keyboard action.
trans-unit.target: 在通过鼠标或键盘操作移动滚动框后发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example scrolls an image in a picture box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例滚动图片框的图像。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> of the scrollbar to redraw a new part of the image whenever the user scrolls.
trans-unit.target: 它使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>滚动条重绘新映像的一部分，只要用户进行滚动。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>类概述。

trans-unit.source: For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用派生的类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> events are created.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>创建事件。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 此代码假定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>已在窗体上创建和按钮有一个事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code.
trans-unit.target: 单击该按钮，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>在代码中调整的滚动条的属性。

trans-unit.source: The label will display the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> property and the event that changed it.
trans-unit.target: 该标签将显示的当前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>属性并更改它的事件。

trans-unit.source: You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event, only the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 您将注意到，当滚动值更改按钮的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>仅事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll> event is raised immediately after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，滚动条滚动时手动<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll>后立即引发事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value to be added to or subtracted from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value" /> property when the scroll box is moved a small distance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置小距离移动滚动框时，在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value" /> 属性中加上或减去的值。

trans-unit.source: A numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 一个数值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: When the user presses one of the arrow keys or clicks one of the scroll bar buttons, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> property changes according to the value set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当用户按某个箭头键或单击滚动条按钮时，之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>根据中设置的值的属性更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: User interface guidelines suggest that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part.
trans-unit.target: 用户界面指南建议<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性设置相对于该用户将看到，不适用于包括不可见的部分的总大小的视图大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有一个图片框带滚动条显示大图像，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性应设置相对图片框的大小，而不图像的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, added a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, and added a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> and a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>、 添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，并添加了一个水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar>和垂直<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>类概述。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> property is set relative to the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>属性设置相对于的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>。

trans-unit.source: You must add references to the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespaces to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 你必须添加对引用<xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType>要运行此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 所分配的值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> control by using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户能否使用 Tab 键将焦点放到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 控件上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can give the focus to the control by using the TAB key; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户可以用 Tab 键将焦点放到该控件上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 当用户按 TAB 键时，则会将输入的焦点设置为下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: Controls with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.TabStop%2A> property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 控制与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.TabStop%2A>属性值`false`不包括在 tab 键顺序中的控件集合。

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate the tab order by setting the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置控件的操作的 tab 键顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此控件关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 与该控件关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Text" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Text" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 控件的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the type and the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ToString%2A>方法返回包括类型和值的字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Updates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 更新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.UpdateScrollInfo%2A> method redraws the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> by using the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.UpdateScrollInfo%2A>方法可重绘<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>通过使用的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a numeric value that represents the current position of the scroll box on the scroll bar control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示滚动框在滚动条控件中的当前位置的数值。

trans-unit.source: A numeric value that is within the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum" /> range.
trans-unit.target: 处于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum" /> 范围内的数值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example scrolls an image in a picture box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例滚动图片框的图像。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> of the scrollbar to redraw a new part of the image whenever the user scrolls.
trans-unit.target: 它使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>滚动条重绘新映像的一部分，只要用户进行滚动。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>类概述。

trans-unit.source: For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值小于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is greater than the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值大于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value" /> property is changed, either by a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> event or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 当通过 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value" /> 事件或以编程方式更改 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> 属性时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用派生的类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> events are created.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>创建事件。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 此代码假定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>已在窗体上创建和按钮有一个事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the button is clicked, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code.
trans-unit.target: 单击该按钮，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>在代码中调整的滚动条的属性。

trans-unit.source: The label will display the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A> property and the event that changed it.
trans-unit.target: 该标签将显示的当前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value%2A>属性并更改它的事件。

trans-unit.source: You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event, only the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 您将注意到，当滚动值更改按钮的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>仅事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll> event is raised immediately after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，滚动条滚动时手动<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Scroll>后立即引发事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅[How to： 编译和运行完整 Windows 窗体代码示例使用 Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。

trans-unit.source: A Windows Message object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Windows 消息对象。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> 方法。
